docs.title: Welcome to LHCb Vilnius group docs
Here the main links to configure your own Fedora distribution are presented.
About
docs.text: This is the doc website of the Vilnius LHCb group.

docs.title: How to sing in to CERN Mattermost Server?
docs.text: Use this link https://mattermost.web.cern.ch to reach the guide.

docs.title: How to install CERN ROOT?
docs.text: Use this link https://root.cern/install/ to reach the installation guide.
